channel.title: purcell on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in purcell on Bodacious Blog

item.title: Review of emacs distributions
item.description: All the distributions I use are overlaid with my own customisations to make them very similar to each other by making my own key bindings and hydras layer. They still retain their own peculiarities, but I have taken a decent portion of code from each distribution to form a common functionality layer. I have over 1300 emacs plugins which all distributions share. Spacemacs Very good default keybindings. Great support for LSP.
